Age , weight height take , detailed history , meticulous clinical examination perform rule disease complete blood picture , serum calcium , phosphorous , alkaline phosphatase , Parathormone 25 Hydroxy-vitamin D ( 25OHD ) do . 25-Hydroxy Vitamin D3 measure house chemiluminescence immunoassay ( CLIA ) ≥30ng/mL take normal , 21-29ng/mL insufficiency ≤20 ng/mL deficiency . The participant knowledge group belong . A second blood sample take end 4 month data enter data base analyze use SPSS Inc version 19 .

DOC.detailed_description: After obtain approval Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) University Dammam inform consent 550 healthy patient , vitamin D deficiency vitamin D insufficiency deficiency recruit . Age , weight height take , detailed history , meticulous clinical examination perform rule disease complete blood picture , serum calcium , phosphorous , alkaline phosphatase , Parathormone 25 Hydroxy-vitamin D ( 25OHD ) do . 25-Hydroxy Vitamin D3 measure house chemiluminescence immunoassay ( CLIA ) ≥30ng/mL take normal , 21-29ng/mL insufficiency ≤20 ng/mL deficiency . The participant divide two group 350 study arm 200 control arm . All participant instruct change dietary habit life style till study . The study group woman instruct apply apply Top-D ( Proniosomal Delivered- Vitamin D3 ) I gram gram contain 5000 IU vitamin D3 . The second group use 1 gram Aloe vera gel . The participant knowledge group belong . A second blood sample take end 4 month data enter data base analyze use SPSS Inc version 19 .
